description: The nation's top infectious disease expert said Sunday that the United States is "struggling" to get the coronavirus crisis under control and that to say otherwise "would be a false statement."
title: Fauci: US is 'struggling' to get coronavirus under control and to say otherwise would be wrong
title_page: Fauci: US is 'struggling' to get coronavirus under control and to say otherwise would be wrong - CNNPolitics
maintext:
Washington (CNN) The nation's top infectious disease expert said Sunday that the United States is "struggling" to get the coronavirus crisis under control and that to say otherwise "would be a false statement."
"Are you saying, doctor, despite the deaths that we may see, that mitigation is working, and that you do have this outbreak under control?" CBS' Margaret Brennan asked Fauci.
"I will not say we have it under control, Margaret. That would be a false statement. We are struggling to get it under control, and that's the issue that's at hand right now," Fauci replied.
